about_the_game:
Paw Kitchen is a unique fusion of roguelike elements and deck-building mechanics set in a charming culinary world. As an aspiring feline chef, players embark on a journey to master the art of cooking through strategic deck construction and creative recipe combinations.

Each run starts with basic ingredient and recipe cards, while successful orders unlock new card choices. The core gameplay revolves around cleverly combining equipment cards, recipe cards, and seasoning cards to create dishes that delight your animal customers. As you progress, you'll unlock premium equipments and advanced recipe, evolving from simple home cooking to sophisticated gourmet creations.

Every animal customer comes with unique taste preferences and requirements, challenging players to adapt their deck strategy accordingly. Through carefully designed card synergies, common ingredients can transform into extraordinary dishes. While failure is part of the journey, each attempt unlocks new content, helping players craft even more impressive dishes in their next run.

Every animal customer comes with unique taste preferences and requirements, challenging players to adapt their deck strategy accordingly. name: Paw Kitchen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: (64 bit) Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 1.8 GHz CPU dual-core. AMD 2.0 GHz dual-core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 Series / Radeon HD 6000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: (64 bit) Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 1.8 GHz CPU dual-core. AMD 2.0 GHz dual-core.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 2GB / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: Build your deck of delectable dishes, feed delicious meals to hungry animal customers, and rise to become a renowned feline private chef! Master the art of cooking through deck-building mechanics as you work your way towards making your culinary dreams come true.
